facts.text: The San Diego expansion team in MLS, owned by Mansour and the Sycuan Tribe, paid a $500 million expansion fee.
San Diego FC sold 5,000 season ticket deposits within a day of the expansion team announcement.
San Diego FC's first player, Duran Ferree, was signed in December 2023.
San Diego FC announced a five-year partnership with Club Tijuana in May 2024, which includes an annual friendly match.
Hirving "Chucky" Lozano was signed as San Diego FC's first Designated Player in June 2024.
San Diego FC selected five players during the 2024 MLS expansion draft on December 11.
San Diego FC won their first match 2–0 against LA Galaxy on February 23, 2025.
The first home match at Snapdragon Stadium for San Diego FC was a 0–0 tie against St. Louis City SC on March 1, 2025, attended by 34,506 fans.
The team's crest features a shield in chrome and azul, with a design called "The Flow" representing the 18 cities of San Diego County.
San Diego FC's first jersey, unveiled on December 13, 2024, has a dark "azul" background with white trim and a "gradient piping" of red to blue on the sides.
The team announced their first jersey sponsorship with DirecTV on July 18, 2024.
